thread.section_title: Veterans United Home Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Veterans United Home Loans | www.veteransunited.com
thread.title: Yvonne Nino
thread.title_full: Veterans United Home Loans reviewed by Yvonne Nino

author: Yvonne Nino
title: Yvonne Nino
text: Working with Veterans United Home Loans made the purchasing of our new home so much easier. They always responded and answers our questions immediately and they corresponded with our realtor, which made everything go smoothly. I would definitely recommend them to any Veteran looking to purchase a home. Matt and Samantha were wonderful to work with.
